preconditions.precondition: A member wants to share a work

mainSequence.step: Member requests to share a work
UI Manager shows the file share form to the Member
Member fills in content details and uploads a file
Application displays the analysis results to the Member
Application copies the file to the "To be moderated" directory
Application transmits the transaction and file to the server
Server notifies the Librarian of the submission
Application notifies the Member of the moderation wait
